titles.title: Worthy O Worthy Are You Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Worthy oh worthy are You Lord
Worthy to be thanked and praised
And worshipped and adored
Worthy oh worthy are You Lord
Worthy to be thanked and praised
And worshipped and adored

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Singing hallelujah
Lamb upon the throne
We worship and adore You
We make Your glory known
Hallelujah glory to the King
You're more than a conqueror
and You're Lord of everything
